trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.ControlType.Document" /> control types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Espone i tipi di controllo <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.ControlType.Document" /> all'automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer> represents documents and supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer> rappresenta documenti e supporta il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.

trans-unit.source: Objects such as a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> can contain embedded objects, such as images and hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti come un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> può contenere oggetti incorporati, ad esempio immagini e i collegamenti ipertestuali.

trans-unit.source: Initially, when you try to get the child elements of the document, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> does not return the embedded objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizialmente, quando si tenta di ottenere gli elementi del documento, figlio <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> non restituisce gli oggetti incorporati.

trans-unit.source: To get the embedded elements, obtain a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> and call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere gli elementi incorporati, ottenere un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> dal <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> e chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called, any elements in that <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> are returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> viene chiamato, tutti gli elementi in cui <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> restituiti da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Unless you know the document is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, you should not call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Se non si conosce il documento è un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, non è necessario chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> sul <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: If the document is loaded from a network location, calling <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> on the entire document is resource intensive.
trans-unit.target: Se il documento viene caricato da un percorso di rete, la chiamata <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> sull'intero documento è risorsa con utilizzo intensivo.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should use one of the methods on <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> that returns a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> that represents a portion of the document.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è necessario utilizzare uno dei metodi su <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> che restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> che rappresenta una parte del documento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per il controllo associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Text" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Text" /> in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the screen coordinates of the element that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> che rappresenta le coordinate sullo schermo dell’elemento associato a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Rettangolo di delimitazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'insieme di elementi figlio per l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: Because <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> gives access to its content through <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern" />, this method always returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Poiché <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> fornisce accesso al contenuto tramite <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern" />, questo metodo restituisce sempre <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "Document".
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene “Document”.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that represents the clickable space that is on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> che rappresenta lo spazio selezionabile in <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The point that represents the clickable space that is on the element.
trans-unit.target: Punto che rappresenta lo spazio selezionabile dell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Text" />, this method returns an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Text" />, questo metodo restituisce <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> is understood by the end user as interactive or the user might understand the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> viene considerato dall'utente finale come interattivo oppure il <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> viene considerato parte della struttura logica del controllo in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> è fuori dallo schermo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l’elemento non è sullo schermo; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà indica se l'elemento è visibile.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: In alcuni casi, un elemento è visualizzato sullo schermo, ma non è ancora visibile.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se l'elemento è nascosto da altri elementi, potrebbe non essere visibile.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, il metodo restituisce `false`.
